context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: check the receipts and compare them with the register's record to find out if there was a miscalculation or error in processing payments
check the sales records and receipts thoroughly to see if there was any discrepancy or mistake
immediately inform his supervisor or the owner of the bakery about the missing money and try to trace back through all transactions in an attempt to figure out where the discrepancy lies
immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery
immediately inform his superiors about the missing money and assist in investigating the situation
investigate and ask other employees if they mistakenly took the money, misplaced it or made an error while giving change to customers
immediately report the discrepancy to his supervisor or store owner
check the security cameras to see if he can identify when the money went missing or if there was any foul play involved
review the security cameras to see if there were any customer or employee interactions that might explain the missing money
contact his supervisor or the owner of the bakery to report the discrepancy

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

contact her teacher immediately

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay where they are
stay in one location once they realize they are lost
stay in one place
stay put and resist the temptation to keep moving around
stay put and try to create a shelter
start rationing the food and water they have left to ensure it lasts as long as possible, while also making sure they all stay as warm as they can
stay put if their location is safe, to increase the likelihood of being found by the rescue team
stay in one place and not wander around, so that the rescue team can find them more easily
stay calm and plan their next steps carefully
stay calm and keep everyone together
